title: I think you guys need more beta testers
body: last patch Gangplank was disabled because of a bug with his barrels, this patch Fiora is already disabled coming straight out of the pbe, as much as I appreciate Riot for keeping true to their word and pumping out patches at the announced date and as glad as I am they were able to react as swiftly as they did to this bug, isn't the PBE there to make sure these bugs don't hit live servers? As much as I love new balance changes, I like being able to play reworked champions on their release date even more. I think you might need more beta testers so you can sniff out and handle bugs better before the patches hit live servers.

replies.body: Is Fiora still disabled? It doesn't say so, I'm still updating. If she isn't, you're kinda complaining over nothing...
A fix came out earlier today, seems to me that its fixed now. Theres no more blurb saying shes disabled so it seems shes good to go again
I agree with this patch in particular. There are so many bugs. Especially the one with the ward skins making people dodge queues.
Oce finds like 1/2 these bugs, what does NA find? 1 in every 24?

Back when patches were not synced, NA was the first server to get updates.
They once ended up getting a glitched patch and had the entire server disabled for almost a week.
